<link href="../coder.css" rel="stylesheet">
<script src="../coder.js"></script>
<script>
  new Coder(document.querySelector('#coder-demo-files'), {
    files: [
      {
        type: 'html',
        url: '../demo-home/ripple.html'
      },
      {
        type: 'css',
        url: '../demo-home/ripple.css'
      }
    ]
  });
</script>
